explains: adj. 跨国的；超越国界的
wordGroup: transnational enterprise 跨国企业，越国企业
transnational company 跨国公司（等于multinational company）

sentences.en: In spite of the current world economic downturn, the transnational corporation is continuing with its investment plans in China.
sentences.cn: 尽管目前世界经济低迷，但这家跨国公司仍继续进行在中国的投资计划。

sentences.en: More than 240 transnational corporations were surveyed for this report.
sentences.cn: 这份报告对240多家跨国公司进行了调查。

sentences.en: Avoiding dangerous conflicts over water will require three transnational initiatives.
sentences.cn: 要避免针对水资源的危险冲突，需要三项跨国的行动方案。
